## RadioControl type

A structure representing a [Radio](./fast-foundation.radio.md) element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RadioControl = Pick<HTMLInputElement, "checked" | "disabled" | "readOnly" | "focus" | "setAttribute" | "getAttribute">;
```
